channel.title: Price Guide
channel.description: Excuse me not sure if this is the right place to post this but does anyone no a decent price guide that will keep the economy stable on my server. and sorry if this is not the place to post it

item.title: Price Guide
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Just implement a player directed economy with no limits. Eventually things will level out. If you just have static prices for everything acquiring wealth (the real end-game of RuneScape) gets boring. You should really only be selling low-level and general items.

Read full topic

item.title: Price Guide
item.dc:creator: @killerkody killerkody
item.description:
@killerkody wrote:

I don’t know if this is either but it’s kinda like server help so… Google price guides for big servers that you know have good economy’s.

Read full topic
